    Rent(String name, Car car, Date pick, Date ret)
    Creates a new Rent object The return date must be at least one day after the pickup date, otherwise set it to one day after the pick up date.

    • Rent

      public Rent(String name, Car car, Date pick, Date ret)
      Creates a new Rent object The return date must be at least one day after the pickup date, otherwise set it to one day after the pick up date.
      Parameters:
      name - the client's name
      car - the rented car
      pick - the pickup date
      ret - the return date

    • upgrade

      public int upgrade(Car newCar)
      Try to upgrade the car to a better car If the given car is better than the current car of the rent, upgrade it and return the upgrade additional cost, otherwise - don't upgrade
      Parameters:
      newCar - the car to upgrade
      Returns:
      the upgrade cost

    • overlap

      public Rent overlap(Rent other)
      Check if there is a double listing of a rent for the same person and car with an overlap in the rental days If there is - return a new rent object with the unified dates, otherwise - return null.
      Parameters:
      other - the other rent
      Returns:
      the unified rent or null

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a String that represents this rent
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String that represents this rent in the following format: Name:Rama From:30/10/2022 To:12/11/2022 Type:B Days:13 Price:1845
